Greetings everyone,

I hope everyone survived Christmas and New Years. I de=
cided to spend 
2007 finding out what the 'old Kanji' and Kao on my Kunitom=
o stand for. 
I purchased Joly's book and will soon own Haynes' index.

Tod=
ay, my question is............How does one go about sending a Tsuba 
to the=
 NBTHK for shinsa? Should I send the tsuba to NTHK in Chicago? I

e asking this but.... is one better than the other?
